name: Shadow Falls
description:
Note: The web build will likely need to be full-screened to be properly viewed.

Welcome to the quiet town of Shadow Falls!

You are Nyx, a shadow witch who has just moved in!

Use your powers, create shadows, and meet people around town all while relaxing!

CONTROLS:

Note: USE THE 0 (number key) to reload the current scene if any issues compromising your ability to play the game occur.

OVERWORLD:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Interact: E
  • Emergency Level Reset: 0 (the number)

PUZZLE:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Look: Mouse Movement
  • Pickup/Drop/Interact: Left Mouse Button
  • Freeze Item: E while holding
  • Rotate Item: Right Mouse Button + Mouse Movement while holding
  • Emergency Level Reset: 0 (the number)
